appDefaultTitle.message: Load a file to your Alfresco
appDefaultTitle.description: App default title (visible on extension icon hover)

appDescription.message: Quickly load files to your Alfresco

msg_delete_profile.description: Message shown when a profile is deleted succesfully

msg_export_on_file.description: Message shown when the export on file is completed succesfully

msg_error_delete_profile.description: Error message shown when problems occurs deleting a profile

msg_error_delete_profile_not_exist.description: Error message shown when deleting a non-existent profile

msg_error_load_profile.description: Error message shown when problems occur loading profile from db

msg_error_loading_last_used_upload_data.message: Problems loading last used upload data in the form: $data$

msg_error_missing_upload_params.message: Please fill the form to upload the file

msg_error_naming_profile.message: Please give the profile a name before saving it
msg_error_naming_profile.description: Error when saving a new profile. First you have to give it a name

msg_error_save_profile.description: Message shown when a profile is saved

msg_error_saving_upload_params.message: Problems saving upload data from the form: $result$

msg_import_done.message: Data imported succesfully! Please reload the extension to see them applied

msg_import_error_file_ko.message: The uploaded file seems incompatible. Are you sure you loaded a json file of alfresco-upload extension?

msg_import_error_ko.message: Importing data from file failed with error: '$error$'

msg_import_file_ok.message: The file is ok! You can now import data from it

msg_import_no_profiles.message: The file is ok but it does not contains profiles to import

msg_ready_to_send_file.description: Message shown when a file is loaded and ready to be sent to Alfresco

msg_save_profile.description: Message shown when a profile is saved
